response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to both of us, with its worth estimated at $1,200,000. I understand the importance of making this decision and would like to extend to you a special offer. Considering the exceptional quality and the unique benefits this product offers, I am proposing a price of $1,100,000 for it. This represents a significant saving for you while still ensuring a fair return for me. I believe this is a mutually beneficial proposition that respects the intrinsic value of the product while providing you with an attractive deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 1100000}
